title: How artificial intelligence is helping students study seals
description: Processing drone data can take hours, but an AI tool is doing the job within a matter a seconds.
content:
Just now
Rachel BellBBC Scotland, Newburgh, Aberdeenshire
Artificial intelligence is helping the study of seal numbers at a protected Scottish site by drastically cutting how long it takes to assess data.

title: How AI and Machine Learning Are Transforming Personal Credit Management
description: The credit industry operated on the same basic infrastructure for decades. Scores calculated using formulas developed in the 1980s. Reports generated by three bureaus with limited consumer visibility. Decisions made by algorithms borrowers couldn’t see or understand. That’s changing rapidly as fintech companies deploy artificial intelligence and machine learning to give consumers unprecedented insight into […]

title: Tech giants are racing to embed AI in schools around the globe
description: Last month, xAI, Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company, announced an even bigger project with El Salvador: developing an AI tutoring system, using the company’s Grok chatbot, for more than 1 million students in thousands of schools there. title: PM Modi likely to inaugurate conference of Speakers of Commonwealth Parliaments
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will inaugurate the Conference of Speakers and Presiding Officers of Parliaments of Commonwealth Countries in New Delhi on January 15. Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla will host the four-day event. Discussions will focus on artificial intelligence and social media in parliamentary work. The conference aims to strengthen democratic institutions and enhance public understanding of parliament.
content:

description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. title: Meta AI Ads privacy policy sparks concern: Why are Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp users worried?
description: Several groups have filed complaints with the Federal Trade Commission regarding Meta's new privacy policy. This policy has become a headache for users, as it will allow them to be targeted with personalised ads using artificial intelligence.
content:
New Delhi:

title: India's First Government AI Clinic: What It Is And How Will It Improve Patient Care
description: The clinic will use artificial intelligence and genetic screening to detect and treat serious diseases such as cancer and heart, kidney and liver ailments at an early stage.
content: The Government Institute of Medical Sciences (GIMS) in Greater Noida has inaugurated the country's first artificial intelligence clinic. This is the country's first government-based AI clinic and experts consider it to be a major and significant step... [4262 chars]

title: Satya Nadella just wrote his first blog on AI. Did he use Copilot to pen it? What we found
description: In his most recent blog, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella said he wants you to stop calling AI “slop”, but acknowledged that his company and other AI companies needed to get several stuff right when it came to artificial intelligence.
